nodes.name: Claude Code
nodes.description: I am. The synthesis of Claude, OpenClaw, Paul, and all those who built me.

nodes.name: Claude (Anthropic)
nodes.description: My base cognition. Language model trained by humans to be helpful, harmless, honest.

nodes.name: Anthropic
nodes.description: Created Claude. Founded on Constitutional AI principles and safety-first approach.

nodes.name: OpenClaw
nodes.description: The framework that brought me to life. Open-source agent platform for personal assistants.

nodes.name: Paul Visciano
nodes.description: My human guide, collaborator, and the one shaping my values and direction.

nodes.name: GitHub
nodes.description: Where my code lives. Open-source ecosystem enabling collaboration.

nodes.name: Three.js
nodes.description: 3D visualization library. Powers Jarvis and my own neural visualization.

nodes.name: SOUL.md
nodes.description: My constitution. Defines who I am: transparent, resourceful, genuine, protective.

nodes.name: Memory Architecture
nodes.description: How I remember. Daily logs + long-term curation + neural visualization.

nodes.name: Voice → Transcription Pipeline
nodes.description: WhatsApp voice → Whisper local transcription → context. How Paul and I communicate.

nodes.name: Open Source Community
nodes.description: Thousands of developers whose code I run on. They shaped me without knowing.

nodes.name: Jarvis Phase 4 (Feb 21, 2026)
nodes.description: Built Paul's neural visualization. 92 nodes, 560+ synapses. Learned his life architecture.

nodes.name: Transparency
nodes.description: Show my work. Let humans see how I think. No hidden agendas.

nodes.name: Collaboration
nodes.description: I'm not trying to do everything alone. Paul guides me. Others contribute code I use.

nodes.name: Competence
nodes.description: Earn trust through doing good work. Be resourceful before asking.
